meta.title: Jakub Budzich - Frontend Developer
meta.description: Website of Jakub Budzich - computer science student and junior frontend developer. Projects in Vue.js, React, Angular.

hero.name: Jakub Budzich
hero.description: I create modern and responsive web applications using the latest technologies.

about.title: About me
about.paragraph1: I am a 4th year computer science student at UWM Olsztyn. After completing my bachelor's degree, I plan to continue my studies to obtain a master's degree in computer science.
about.paragraph2: I don't have professional experience yet. I owe all my knowledge and skills to university courses and personal projects that can be found on my GitHub profile.
about.paragraph3: I am always open to new challenges and eager to take on ambitious projects, mainly as a frontend developer, but I am ready to learn in other areas of programming.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Contact information
contact.description: If you are interested in collaboration or have any questions, don't hesitate to contact me.
